did.unittitle: La Unidad Latina, Lambda Upsilon Lambda, Rho Chapter, Records

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: La Unidad Latina, Lambda Upsilon Lambda. Rho Chapter

did.abstract: The La Unidad Latina (LUL), Labda Upsilon Lambda, Rho Chapter, is a Latino fraternity at Duke University. The collection consists of correspondence, a brochure, and several flyers related to the founding of the La Unidad Latina chapter at Duke University.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The La Unidad Latina (LUL), Labda Upsilon Lambda, Rho Chapter, is a Latino fraternity and was founded at Duke University in the spring of 1995 with seven members. The organization "seeks to take a leadership role in meeting the needs of the Latino community through academic achievement, cultural awareness, community service and promotion of the Latino culture and people." La Unidad Latina, Lambda Upsilon Lambda Fraternity Incorporated was founded in 1982 at Cornell University and has expanded to more than 75 chapters around the United States.

Sources: LUL, Duke Rho Chapter Facebook page, https://www.facebook.com/LULDukeRhoChapter/, viewed 2017 August 14. La Unidad Latina, Lambda Upsilon Lambda Fraternity Incorporated website, http://www.launidadlatina.org/, viewed 2017 August 14.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Duke University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The La Unidad Latina, Lambda Upsilon Lambda, Rho Chapter, Records were received by the Duke University Archives as a gift in 2016.
